channel.title: Making Spec attack hit 3 times?

item.title: Making Spec attack hit 3 times?
item.dc:creator: @Kieron532 Kieron532
item.description:
@Kieron532 wrote:

Ok normal one is:

public void specialAtk(boolean hitTwice, int specDrain, int projectileHit, int emoteSet) { client AttackingOn2 = (client) server.playerHandler.players[AttackingOn]; int EnemyX = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absX; int EnemyY = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absY; if(isInWilderness(EnemyX, EnemyY, 1) == false && !AttackingOn2.isInPitGame()){ return;

And NPC version is:

public void specialAtkNPC(boolean hitTwice, int specDrain, int projectileHit, int emoteSet) { if(hitTwice && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] != 4153 && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] != 4827 && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] != 861){ DDS2Damg = true; ddsInterval = 1000; lastDds = System.currentTimeMillis();

Read full topic

item.title: Making Spec attack hit 3 times?
item.dc:creator: @Kieron532 Kieron532
item.description:
@Kieron532 wrote:

Ok this is my Godsword Spec attack for an NPC, its also what most of the npc spec attack method attacks look like:

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 9070 && specialAmount > 49){
specialAtkNPC(false, 50, 600, 3547);
npcDamage(30);
specGFX(346);
}

And the one for the Godsword ABOVE that is:
if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 9070 && specialAmount > 49){
setAnimation(407);
specialAmount -= 50;
getHit(30);
specOn = false;
lastSpecial = System.currentTimeMillis();
specGFX(346);
}

Read full topic

item.title: Making Spec attack hit 3 times?
item.dc:creator: @Kieron532 Kieron532
item.description:
@Kieron532 wrote:

Hey guys, im just about to finish coding my dclaws, but i was wondering, is there something i can add to this code that will make it hit 2 or 3 times in one spec attack?:

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 8022 && specialAmount > 49){
setAnimation(440);
specialAmount -= 50;
getHit(30);
specOn = false;
lastSpecial = System.currentTimeMillis();
specGFX(282);
}

Read full topic
